title: A Bond of Destiny and Dragons
description:
When kings and gods fall, a queen will rise. The game of war is changing and the destiny of two friends will alter the course of the future.
Since time began and worlds were created, a brutal conflict has raged, pitting darkness against light and god against goddess. But time and betrayal have caught up with the powerful and the immortal, and the game of war is changing. Now a single female warrior is planning a betrayal which will transform the course of history. Prince Lexon Arjuno and Commander Erzion Riddeon are brothers in everything but blood. When their loved ones and their kingdom are destroyed, the two powerful fae warriors must perform deeds they abhor in order to survive. Despite a powerful bond of friendship, their destinies take very different paths. When a blood pledge to his goddess leaves Erzion immortal, guilt becomes his burden to bear. Now he must endure a life of servitude to the tyrannical usurper of the Avalonian throne. Lexon, forced to flee his home, encounters unimaginable forces within the mysterious, war-torn lands he is compelled to travel. Somehow, he must fulfil his promise to the goddess and build a kingdom and an army for the infant queen he now protects.
author: Karen Tomlinson
